xt:extension.xt:author: Syncro Soft
xt:extension.xt:name: Excel XLSX libraries v3.10

body.p: This add-on contributes additional libraries that makes it possible to import spreadsheet data from Microsoft Excel 2007 and newer.
The add-on is compatible between versions 17.0 and 22.1.
